mapper.insert: insert into Walk(peid, w_img, w_distance, w_time, w_date, w_flag, w_like, w_likeList) values(#{peid}, #{w_img}, #{w_distance}, #{w_time}, now(), 0, #{w_like}, #{w_likeList});
